behavior setup_ironing_board_and_iron(ironing_board: item, iron: item, power_socket: item):
    body:
        achieve open(ironing_board)
        # Ensure ironing board is set up
        achieve plugged(iron)
        # Ensure iron is plugged into the power socket

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select an ironing board
        
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron

        bind power_socket: item where:
            is_powersocket(power_socket)
        # Select a power socket

        setup_ironing_board_and_iron(ironing_board, iron, power_socket)
        # Set up the ironing board and plug in the iron

def has_plug(x: item):
    # Check if the item has a plug
    symbol has_plug_exists=exists o: item : is_powersocket(o) and plugged(x)
    return has_plug_exists

behavior setup_ironing_area(ironing_board:item, iron:item):
    body:
        achieve open(ironing_board)
        # Set up the ironing board by opening it

behavior connect_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        bind power_socket: item where:
            is_powersocket(power_socket)
        achieve plugged(iron)
        # Plug the iron into the power socket

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select an ironing board  
        
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron

        setup_ironing_area(ironing_board, iron)
        connect_iron(iron)

ard correctly.', '3. Iron the pants focusing on each section evenly.', '4. Hang or fold the pants to
 maintain their pressed condition.']

behavior locate_ironing_board(ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, ironing_board)

behavior locate_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, iron)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists ironing_board: item : is_ironing_board(ironing_board):
            bind ironing_board: item where:
                is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
            locate_ironing_board(ironing_board)
            
        else:
            foreach ironing_board: item:
                if is_ironing_board(ironing_board) and not visited(ironing_board):
                    observe(ironing_board, "Locate the ironing board")
                    
        if exists iron: item : is_iron(iron):
            bind iron: item where:
                is_iron(iron)
            locate_iron(iron)
            
        else:
            foreach iron: item:
                if is_iron(iron) and not visited(iron):
                    observe(iron, "Locate the iron")

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Identify the pants that need to be ironed.', '2. Set up the ironing board and iron.', '3. Iron 
the pants.', '4. Fold or hang the ironed pants appropriately.']

def is_clothes_pants(item:item):
    # Function to check if the item is pants for ironing
    symbol pants=exists x: item : is_clothes_pants(x) and x==item
    return pants

def pants_in_basket(item:item):
    # Function to check if the pants are in a basket
    symbol pants_inside=exists basket: item : is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and inside(item, basket)
    return pants_inside

behavior setup_ironing_board(ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve open(ironing_board)
        # Set up the ironing board

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists pants: item : is_clothes_pants(pants) and pants_in_basket(pants):
            # Check if pants that need to be ironed are in a basket
            bind pants: item where:
                is_clothes_pants(pants) and pants_in_basket(pants)
            # Select the pants in the basket
            achieve close_char(char, pants)
            # Move close to the pants for further actions
        else:
            # If the pants are not identified, start observing to locate them
            foreach item: item:
                if is_clothes_pants(item) and not visited(item):
                    observe(item,"Check is there any pants in sight for ironing")
        
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select the ironing board
        setup_ironing_board(ironing_board)
